text: All four were Conservative strongholds. Last September a public poll showed that for the first time since the Administration ver in 1957 the Liberals we ahead (43 per cent were in favour of "The Grits" if a federal election had been held last autumn, 38 per cent for the Conservatives and 12 per cent for the C.C.F.)
